Package sample

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Controller Class for controlling the game

  • Generates blocks, tokens and walls
  • Initializes Snake
  • Has methods required to support a fully functional game
See Also:
Serialized Form

      • gameplay

        protected void gameplay​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane play,
                        javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle r,
                        javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<java.lang.String> dropdown,
                        javafx.scene.control.Button Click,
                        javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage,
                        javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageview)
        This method is called in every frame.It controls the whole game.
      • Updates the score
      • Generates and moves the blocks down
      • Operates the timer for Shield
Parameters:
play - Pane in which blocks,snake,tokens,walls and UI Elements are present
r - UI Panel which contains buttons
Quit - Quit Button
Pause - Pause Button
Restart - Restart Button

  • checkSnakeBalls

    protected void checkSnakeBalls​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane play,
                               javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage,
                               javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageview)
    This method keeps a track of the length of snake

    If it becomes less than 1 , game ends

    Parameters:
    play - Pane in which the game elements are present.

  • gameOver

    protected void gameOver​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane play,
                        javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage,
                        javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageview)
    This method generates a message when the game ends.

    It shows the score made by the user

    Parameters:
    play - Pane in which game elements are present.

  • checkCollision

    protected void checkCollision​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane play,
                              int shieldFlag,
                              int magnetFlag,
                              javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage,
                              javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageview)
    This method checks the collision of different objects with Snake

    Checks collision with Tokens,Walls and Blocks

    Parameters:
    play - Pane in which game elements are present.
    shieldFlag - A variable which tells whether the Shield is alive or not.

  • checkBoundary

    protected void checkBoundary​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane play)
    This method checks the boundary to remove the falling objects from the pane
    Parameters:
    play - Pane from which the objects (which crossed the boundary) needs to be removed.
